original: Lindberg, Nils Daniel, vattenrätts-domare, Vänersborg, f. 10/12/97 i Gbg av Mauritz L. o. Maria Sernström. G. 25 m. Gärd Petander. Barn: Marianne f. 27, Anita 30, Barbro 33, Ingela 41. — Jur. kand. i Upps. 22. Aman. v. Västerbygdens vattendomst. avd. f. Vänermålet 25, sekr. där 30 o. tf. vattenrättsdom. 36, adjung. led. i Svea hovr., vattenöverdomst. 37-38 o. 39, tf. rev:sekr. 40, vattenrättsdom. v. Västerbygdens vattendomst. sed. 41. Sekr. h. sakk. ang. lagstiftn. om vattenförorening 38-39. Hobbies : segling o. tennis. RNO.
translated: Lindberg, Nils Daniel, water rights judge, Vänersborg, b. 10/12/97 in Gothenburg to Mauritz L. and Maria Sernström. Married 25 to Gärd Petander. Children: Marianne b. 27, Anita b. 30, Barbro b. 33, Ingela b. 41. — LL.B. in Uppsala in 1922. Trainee at the Västerbygdens Water Court division for Vänermålet in 1925, secretary there in 1930 and acting water rights judge in 1936, adjunct member of the Svea Court of Appeal and the Water Appeal Court in 1937-1938 and 1939, acting legal secretary in 1940, water rights judge at the Västerbygdens Water Court since 1941. Secretary to the higher committee on legislation regarding water pollution in 1938-1939. Hobbies: sailing and tennis. RNO (Royal Order of the North Star).

structured.name: Nils Daniel Lindberg

organization.name: Higher Committee on Legislation Regarding Water Pollution

structured.memberOf: Royal Order of the North Star
